department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Acts as the previleged supplier for elevators needed for National Defense
full_summary:
**Tender Title**: W684E-23LP32 Elevator Inspection & Maintenance

**Reference Number**: WS4089411617-Doc4092016940

**Publication Date**: September 7, 2023

**Tender Closing Date and Time**: November 9, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

**Amendment Details**: Amendment 4, dated October 30, 2023

**Contract Details**:

* Contract Duration: October 10, 2023, to October 29, 2027
* Expected Contract Value:
* Procurement Category: CNST
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and 14 other trade agreements
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Project Description**: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a contractor to provide elevator inspection and maintenance services at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Edmonton. The services include labour, tools, equipment, material, transportation, and supervision necessary to perform inspections, maintenance, repairs, and installation of elevators systems.

**Submission Information**:

* Important Notice: Due to a modification, the closing time for bid submission has been extended to 2:00 PM EST on November 9, 2023. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.
* Contact Information: Abou Ahmad, Kassan (SPAC/PSPC), kassan.abouahmad@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Bid Submission Requirements**:

* Bidder must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by the closing time of November 9, 2023.
* Site Visit: An optional site visit will be held on October 4, 2023, from 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM.

To respond to this tender opportunity, please visit the Ariba Discovery website [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17388789?extsite=MTczODg3ODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17388789?extsite=MTczODg3ODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). You can also refer to the revised Request for Proposal (RFP) for further instructions.
